oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Sure - We All Want to Go Home"
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: War, Military
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Four soldiers singing at the top of the cartoon and men marching at gun point to a Nazi prison at the bottom.
